nodes.bodyText: Debug system out should be removed.

Compilation fails after removal
package org.osgi.framework does not exist
package org.osgi.service.component.annotations does not exist
package org.osgi.util.tracker does not exist
Multiple cannot find symbol all in  com/vaadin/flow/server/osgi/ServletContainerInitializerExtender
"servletContext" is a method parameter, and should not be used for synchronization.
